topics.body:
!http://i1.kym-cdn.com/photos/images/original/000/969/624/9b1.png!
"And none of them were inspired by either of the others.
Why did this happen, I wonder?
Is there a common, red-bandana-wearing black cat ancestor that unites them?
Or are people simply naturally drawn to the idea of red bandanas on black cats?"

Gotcha Force.

"@Number1pegasus":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/55665d0e6368724901f90700#post_55665d0e6368724901f90700
What Trash said.
Extract the file, and put that file in a folder.
Open the emulator, then I guess you need to open the menu, search the game you want to play (the file) and click to it.
